    • Method Detail

      • compare

        public static int compare(java.lang.Class<?> a,
                          java.lang.Class<?> b)
        Compares inheritance of a and b.
        Parameters:
        a - First class to compare.
        b - Second class to compare.
        Returns:
        -1 if neither a is assignable to b and b is not assignable to a, or have lower inheritance. Returns 1 if a have higher inheritance. Returns 0 if both are equals or have same inheritance level.

      • isCompatible

        public static boolean isCompatible(java.lang.Class<?> a,
                                   java.lang.Class<?> b)
        Returns whether a is compatible to b. (Either a is assignable from b or b is assignable from a).
        Parameters:
        a - First class.
        b - Second class.
        Returns:
        Whether a is compatible to b. (Either a is assignable from b or b is assignable from a).

      • getInheritLevel

        public static int getInheritLevel(java.lang.Class<?> a)
        Gets inheritance level of a.
        Parameters:
        a - Class to get inheritance level.
        Returns:
        Inheritance level of a.

      • getSortedSuperTypes
